# build: refactor test targets to use centralized rules

consolidates test target definitions from individual cook.mk files into a centralized rule in the Makefile, eliminating duplication for 15 standard 3p modules.

- Makefile - add 3p_test_rule to generate dependencies for standard modules
- 3p/*/cook.mk - remove redundant .ok target definitions from 16 modules

preserved special cases with custom dependencies: argparse, lua, ast-grep, tl, cosmos, luaunit, lib/build/*, lib/cosmic/*

## Validation

- [x] manifest regenerated after refactoring is identical to before
- [x] dry-run builds verify correct TEST_BIN_DIR values
- [x] eliminates 27 lines of duplication
